sentence.Network_en: Doctor believed that his low sperm count was the problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生认为他的精子数太低是问题所在。

sentence.Network_en: Conception occurs when a single sperm fuses with an egg.
sentence.Network_cn: 当一个精子和一个卵子结合时受孕就发生了。

sentence.Network_en: It only takes one sperm to fertilize an egg.
sentence.Network_cn: 只需要一个精子就能让卵子受精。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via late Latin from Greek sperma 'seed', from speirein 'to sow'

encyclopedia.content: 精子分动物精子与植物精子。动物有性生殖过程中的雄性细胞，雄性动物的生殖细胞，异配生殖中的雄配子，由精子器产生的单倍体生殖细胞。而生活中精子更多是指男性成熟的生殖细胞，在精巢中形成。

entry.def: A sperm is a cell which is produced in the sex organs of a male animal and can enter a female animal's  egg and fertilize it.

example.ex: Conception occurs when a single sperm fuses with an egg...
example.tran: 当一个精子和一个卵子结合时受孕就发生了。

example.ex: Any disease which undermines a man's general health will interfere with his sperm production...
example.tran: 任何有损男性整体健康状况的疾病都会影响精子的产生。

entry.def: Sperm is used to refer to the liquid that contains sperm when it is produced.

means.word_mean: 1. the male reproductive cell; the male gamete;

sentences.sentence: "a sperm is mostly a nucleus surrounded by little other cellular material"

sentences.en: In human reproduction, one female egg is usually fertilized by one sperm.
sentences.cn: 在人体生殖过程中, 一个精子使一个卵子受精。
